channel.title: Bulls eYe - Constant Power
channel.description:
This script donst aim for you. It only makes sure the power of the arrow is more of less the same every time Make Sure you drag the Crossair and sellect the Bulls Eye Game window Try using a Ruler for aiming the bulls eye (Till i find a good equation)...
SELECT THE GAME WINDOW - ADJUST THE ANGLE OF THE ARROW - PRESS (CTRL + ALT + R)
You can also adjust the power level according to your needs... Please look at the script.

item.title: Bulls eYe - Constant Power
item.dc:creator: @alienware alienware
item.description:
@alienware wrote:

Yea… i can too…
Just have to get those ratios right…

But the prob starts when the Bulls eye is at the the highest height.

item.title: Bulls eYe - Constant Power
item.dc:creator: @alienware alienware
item.description:
@alienware wrote:

I have told its not for hitting the bulls eyes…
Its for keeping a constant power level so you can be sure that if the aim is correct. its going to hit the bulls eye.

I am working on the auto aim script.
but it dosnt work properly when the board comes too close

Read full topic

item.description:
@script_owned4 wrote:

This is a pretty good script, but there isn’t any point of making one if it doesent hit the bullseye.Very nice job.
